messages.text: I guess you just saw our fabulous reports!
you are two fantastic salesman, the company is proud of you
You're the best john!
Thanks john! you're the bes t
You are both so smart!
I agree with both of you
I think so too, it's phenomenal.
We really have the best chemistry ever!
I haven't been this happy at work in a long time.
It is my absolute pleasure guys!
That sounds like the best day ever! John you are fantastic!
Yes, that's a fantastic idea! I love it!!
I love my job too. we should celebrate !
I can't wait to show my clients this new presentation. I love my job!
John, we couldn't do this without you! Thanks for helping us out!
You make my job easier, so thank you for that!
This is such fantastic news! I am proud of you guys!
Thanks Tony! you're the best!
No problem, it was a great article. I will show my clients when I get a chance
You did very good work on my report! You are a life saver!
You're welcome tony, I love helping out my colleagues!
Yes! this will give me a great advantage during my presentation! i am so excited1
He did a good job? that's great news! always helpful this one!
I love the work you did on my proposal alex! thank you!
I appreciate that Alex. Keep up the good work
Thanks john, that means a lot coming from you! you are my mentor
I will keep that in mind. you are our best new salesman in a long time!
Thanks, that would be great! Even if it's in the New York office, I would be happy to go.
You are a great worker, I know that you can do it! I will tell management that you are still very motivated for a promotion.
Okay, I can do that. I hope you will give me a good review.
I think you should do at least forty hours. That is what is expected of you.
John, how much work do I have to do this week?
Sounds good!
that makes sense. while i look for it, please tell me what you think of the essay i just sent you.
Cool, i remember that everyone had liked it quite a bit, so i want to take advantage of it!
Yes, sure. I think I remember where i put it.
tony, send me the excel document you used for your deal three weeks ago, please?
Yes, absolutely! give me ten minutes
John, could you send over the code of ethics from Monica? she suggested i look over it before signing the order.
No, thanks, I'm all set. I'm going to start working on my presentation.
is there anything you guys need from me while i'm around?
Thanks alex, that is perfect!
Okay, how about noon? I'll bring you some coffee, I know you love coffee
I can do friday, what time would you like? we can do anything you like, I'm easygoing!
Yeah for sure, do you want to meet on friday?
Alex, can we talk about the proposals that we have to finish before the end of the quarter? those are so complicated
Me too alex, me too!
you two are so fun, i love working with youy
thanks john!
haha tony you are a character! you are so funny!
Why do you always get the french customers? the only french guys that call me are the ones looking for directions and general advice
You're welcome. the french are keeping my months positive. I have had a lot of clients leave because of the recession, but that hasn't stopped the french from ordering antibiotics
thank you, alex, for pointing this out.
It makes a better case for closing the office, since they're not even getting the volume they should be
I get a dozen callers a day asking for comments and pricing drafts, but i didn't realize they were supposed to go through the london office
Wow! that's great news, can't beleive we didn't think of that sooner
Indeed, the montreal office can handle volume from french speaking nations! that should be enough to justify a salary increase for the both of you actually. I will let you know
That's a great comment, i hadn't thought of it!
I hope that we can get better salary so i can justify staying late nights talking to the european clients who don't want to deal with the bad london office
I focus more on the volume, and i have signed 23 accounts this week, without being aggressive
other than that, i like my job and hope the numbers will start to look good again. I have been signing on new accounts about twice a week. they are usually medium to large sized accounts.
Yes, but only because of alex. i think the office is bad and the salary is too low
Okay, i'll take note of that. as I said you guys are great workers! have you been feeling productive recently?
I do really like what i'm doing here, it's so fun
my numbers weren't good either, but i think it's because this is a slow month
My numbers aren't so good, i had a bad month, but i am still motivated
let's get on with it now, how are your numbers?
I love the team chemistry that they have built
Yes for sure, those were just really fun days. Our ceo was great, and so were our corporate events
Aw poor john! we take good care of you here don't we?
haha john is nostalgic! i didn't think i'd ever see the day.
He once had the ugliest cadillac, everyone made fun of him for it! it was the good old days
He keeps telling me that I should've been a hairdresser, i'm not sure how to take that
He really is!
haha please send us chris! tom is kind of a dick
That would be so fun! it's lonely to be just us two, you never come to see us anymore
I don't know, I'd have to ask. It's not a done deal yet, and they don't want to let go of tom and chris so they might reassign them in this office or in the new york office. I can't tell you guys yet
thanks for your compliments john. i really appreciate the support. if they close the london office, do you think we can get higher pay?
I have never seen so much effort go into creating a coherent team. We're all in this together 1
The corporate events here are actually fantastic
Thanks to the fun corporate events?
I think we're really complementary actually. we have great team chemistry
Haha you couldn't sell a car to a driver Alex! thank goodness i'm around
i know john, it's thanks to me! and tony :wink:
can't say the same about this office though, you guys are record holders!
I talked to management and they said it is losing money one day at a time
Haha we're working on it. They might close the office to be honest
Same, I don't know how they do it. Imagine having to get up for work everyday to go to that office!
The people in london really have it worse. I think they should get an office renovation first if anything. I went there two years ago and it was too much for me.
No, but I'm going to. I've been so busy with the london and new york office, mostly because they are unahppy.
You would be great at that! have you poked around to see what might be possible?
Thanks guys! I don't know, maybe something in operations? we have some cool projects underway there right now, and I would to be a part of it
Haha john for president! what are you aiming after being head of sales?
John you are the best. I think all of us salesman really appreciate your effort and attentiveness.
don't think nobody notices. People notice. I am going to talk to corporate about this. They like the montreal office quite a bit, and I know that they value your feedback
Listen, I get it guys i get it. But at least team chemistry is good for you guys, even if the hours are too long and the pay is too low, you guys are still good at your jobs, and that is valuable
Haha yes tony! you've been quiet this whole day and you come out to complain
there really isn't any excuse for this. The whole set up is awful.  I can't work properly. On top of that, pay is bad.
I completely agree with you guys on that regard. My clients have complained as well
<@U1E79R9U2|tonyrio> has joined the channel
